trans-unit.source: Carries information required to process the $MCN_GETDAYSTATE notification me

seg-source.mrk: Carries information required to process the $MCN_GETDAYSTATE notification me

target.mrk: Carries information required to process the $MCN_GETDAYSTATE notification me

trans-unit.source: Contains information about a notification message.

trans-unit.source: The total number of elements that must be in the array at pDayState

seg-source.mrk: The total number of elements that must be in the array at pDayState

target.mrk: The total number of elements that must be in the array at pDayState

trans-unit.source: Address of an array of MONTHDAYSTATE (DWORD bit field that holds the state of each day in a month)

seg-source.mrk: Address of an array of MONTHDAYSTATE (DWORD bit field that holds the state of each day in a month)

target.mrk: Address of an array of MONTHDAYSTATE (DWORD bit field that holds the state of each day in a month)

trans-unit.source: Each bit (1 through 31) represents the state of a day in a month. If a bit is on, the corresponding day will be displayed in bold; otherwise it will be displayed with no emphasis.

seg-source.mrk: Each bit (1 through 31) represents the state of a day in a month.
If a bit is on, the corresponding day will be displayed in bold; otherwise it will be displayed with no emphasis.

target.mrk: Each bit (1 through 31) represents the state of a day in a month.
If a bit is on, the corresponding day will be displayed in bold; otherwise it will be displayed with no emphasis.

trans-unit.source: The buffer at this address must be large enough to contain at least DayState elements.

seg-source.mrk: The buffer at this address must be large enough to contain at least DayState elements.

target.mrk: The buffer at this address must be large enough to contain at least DayState elements.
